phrases: Always consult with the person in charge.
We will rank all the students on a scale of A to F
based on their genomic resonance values,
and you, Shu, will reign over them.
You could call it a Void ranking system.
I will make the boo-boo... all better!
That girl's Void is really something!
I want her to heal me, too.
You healed that injury really well before.
Compared to you, my Void is just...
The important thing is not how strong your void is,
it is how you you use it.
The reality of the destruction around us fills our mind
The raging rain sounds like a storm of tears
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your eyes were given to you to acknowledge others,
that your voice was given to you to tell others how you feel
Your heart contains all its truth
Even when all you see in your path are storms
remember that your strength is no coincidence
We did perform a general Void exam,
but I could not accept Yahiro's Void ranking plan.
I do not think supervising everyone in a way that makes them feel bad
I cannot honestly say there are not
any problems in our school right now.
Security training has been so hardcore, that it is made me extremely hungry!.
We have got all kinds of problems.
getting closer and closer all the time.
If we do not keep it together...
We have not even completed half of our plans
or secure vaccine and ammo supplies.
This is why I keep telling you to implement the ranking system!
when there is a clear hierarchy.
Discriminating against people because of their Voids...
That is just semantics, you know?
If they feel like it is discrimination, it is the same thing, is not it?
It is not that I do not understand how you feel,
but the red line is not going to stop.
Do you think that is okay?
Well, you have got a point, but...
That is what Gai always said.
I bet you just do not want people to hate you.
What do you want to do, Shu?
Do not think about what the others want.
What do you want to do?
What is going on between Yuzuriha and Shu?
Oh, I want to know too!
Like I said, why are you asking me?
I thought Shu was against the ranking system.
Inori could tell that Shu was uncertain.
You know, I was happy that Shu became president.
I thought he could be a kind king...
Yeah, this is pretty much Shu's kingdom, is not it?
If you are going to tease me, then forget I said anything!
Hurry up and confess to him already!
Just look at the times we are living in.
I am disappointed in you, Shu!
I cannot believe you would use a system like that!
I am not going to use it!
I am sorry I said I was disappointed in you, Shu!
You do not have to go that far...
This means we are friends again, right?
Okay then, let us give a good howl!
Times like these, a good shout together deepens a friendship.
You have seen it in movies, right?
Do not discriminate against your friends!
What is that got to do with it?
We are supposed to do this kind of stuff.
Go on, you say something, Shu!
I am not cut out to be student council president!
What is wrong with not wanting people to hate me?!
What is wrong with wanting girls to like me?!
Down with the Void ranking system!
No matter how you calculate it, this is not enough.
What if we injected smaller doses?
It has to be a fixed dosage.
We have got a problem, Shu!
We do not have enough vaccine.
For now, we should at least secure Ouma's dosage.
I should not get special treatment...
If you get sick, who is going to protect the school?
The most useful Voids should be given priority, too.
Here is everyone in order of rank.
We will distribute the vaccine based on this.
We have no choice if we want to survive.
It is the duty of the person in charge to make these decisions.
I found it while I was cleaning out the student council room.
What is this Void ranking system?
All of us are in the lowest rank!
So are they going to just give up on us?!
You are not going to use the ranking system.
Listen, we have a favor to ask.
Will you draw out our Voids?
My Void was useful when you used it before, was not it?
But when I use it myself, all I can do is open a can...
I think I can get better with a little practice.
Now that they do not have enough vaccine, they will definitely come.
They are just a bunch of students.
Is it worth sending me out just for them?
Lieutenant, when that patriotic young man
offered to hand over members of the Undertakers the other day,
you did not shoot, did you?
Should not you prove that you can pull the trigger,
You are quite good at this!
Just what I would expect from the Undertakers' chief advisor.
Can I assume you are telling the truth when you say that when I win,
you will let me see him?
That is if you can win.
I thought you would be here.
Everyone is been looking for you.
I screwed up a little and became depressed.
Well, lots of things, but really...
It is more about how I only think about what people want to hear.
In front of Yahiro I agree with him,
and in front of Souta I agree with him.
Of course it is, especially for a leader.
I know many of your good points, Shu.
You never make a lot of noise.
Whether you are sitting in a chair or putting something down,
you do it softly, do not you?
And I love how you do not go around declaring things.
That is only because I do not have any confidence.
I did not mean to say that to you, but...
Tamadate and the others just left the school!
They are all holding their Voids.
Does that mean that you approved this?
There is a hospital up ahead.
A hospital would probably have the vaccine.
You are trying to say I am stupid because I am a Rank F?
We are going to bring back the vaccine
and prove we are not the lowest rank!
Wait, is that what you were planning when you asked me for your Voids?
Hide in one of those buildings!
Going after him is your top priority!
If Ouma Shu is alive... then is the runt alive, too?
Today's not the time for that.
If we do not, Shu'll be in danger too!
If you think I will let you fix a car with those, you are dreaming!
I cannot believe Shu went out on his own.
Does he understand the position he is in?
Today's mission is to kill them all.
This is a good target for them!
Have you ever read a picture book called The Kind King?
He gave everyone money and land,
until the country was no more.
All the people were angry at the king.
I think he was my first love.
You are like that king, Shu...
Hey, there is one over there.
I think you are going to be a great king.
Shu, I will give you my...
You have finally shown yourself, Ouma Shu.
It is because I asked Hare to fix that car!
It is your fault Hare died.
Because of your vanity, you took Hare out there.
She said I had a lot of good points.
We have to separate the good from the trash.
I am going to become king.
